description:
Marufuji Izumi is a 23 years old city hall public servant, co-worker and friend of http://anidb.net/ch19485 [Minegishi Kaoruko] and http://anidb.net/ch19486 [Takase Yuuki] whom she teams up with for their investigation of the events in this town. Her breasts are at least G-cup size; she is very sensitive about any allegation they might not be natural. She often drinks more alcohol than she can handle.
http://anidb.net/ch9745 [The unnamed protagonist] meets her by chance in a fully occupied train (and saves her from a molester - never wearing a bra attracts all kinds of people to her).
name: Marufuji Izumi
